name: Dungeon Breakout (steinercamp)
description:
Title: Dungeon Breakout

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: RPG

Rating: E 

Target Market: Casual gamers who prefer more traditional RPGs

Game Overview: Guide Charlie Archer on his quest to break out of the dungeon! Fight enemies and find the exit.

Move with WASD, attack with Space, battle using the mouse. Your goal is to defeat all the enemies in the dungeon.

Game Design Team: Andrew Nguyen, Camp Steiner, Tyrese Peoples
